feed.title: Category: labor mate | White Peak Software Blog

entry.title: ANN: Labor Mate 1.7 is in the App Store
entry.content: The latest version of Labor Mate, the best dang labor contraction timer for the iPhone and iPod touch, is now available in the App Store. This update is FREE to existing user. The update includes a much improved UI, compatibility with iOS4 and multitasking, and support for the new retina display on iPhone 4.

entry.title: Labor Mate 1.6 is Now Available
entry.content: Labor Mate 1.6 has been approved by Apple and is now available in the App Store. This version fixes the problem with the No button displayed after touching the Reset button.

entry.title: ANN: Labor Mate 1.5 in App Store
entry.content:
I’m pleased to announce the release of Labor Mate version 1.5, which is now available in the App Store. This release fixes a few bugs but more importantly it adds support for 8 new languages. Labor Mate now supports the following languages:

  • Dutch
  • French
  • German
  • Italian
  • Japanese
  • Spanish
  • Swedish
  • Russian

Labor Mate is available for only $0.99 in the iTunes App Store.

entry.title: Labor Mate v1.4 Available in the App Store
entry.content: The newest version of Labor Mate, version 1.4, is now available in the App Store. This new release includes an improved user interface as well as some bug fixes.
